title: I am 14 years of age. I really want to work on YouTube. Should I become a Minecraft YouTuber or a tech reviewer? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to be a youtuber, do something you like doing. What you should also consider is the fact that there are already a lot of minecraft youtubers. They got famous primarily because they were the first to present Minecraft. So if you are going to do play MC, play with mods or something. If you do something unique, you might gain some traction.
